label: ham
subject: Re: using a homemade perl module
body: 42 (return) [ I use indifferently the words _ducat_ and _florin_, which derive their names, the former from the _dukes_ of Milan, the latter from the republic of _Florence_. These gold pieces, the first that were coined in Italy, perhaps in the Latin world, may be compared in weight and value to one third of the English guinea.]
